**Purpose**

Standardises the AppealAttributeMatrix entity from raw (odw-raw) into the odw-standardised zone as a Delta table. This notebook is designed to run as part of the pln_ref_appeal_attribute_matrix pipeline whenever a new file has been uploaded to fileshare (i.e. when the appeal matrix gets updated)

**Inputs**

Latest folder from: odw-raw/AppealAttributeMatrix/<YYYY-MM-DD>/appeals-attribute-matrix.csv

**Outputs**

Delta path: odw-standardised/AppealAttributeMatrix/appeal_attribute_matrix

Table: odw_standardised_db.appeal_attribute_matrix

**Key Transformations**

Pick latest ingestion folder (YYYY-MM-DD).

Drop unnamed / _c* columns.

Rename columns to camelCase.

Filter out rows with null/blank attribute.

Write as Delta with schema merge + overwrite.

**Note:** 
mergeSchema and overwriteSchema ensure any schema changes (new/removed columns) are applied automatically so its not needed to drop/recreate the table manually if a new file arrives - the overwrite handles it.

import re
from pyspark.sql.functions import col
from datetime import datetime

#Latest ingestion date from odw-raw
base_dir = f"abfss://odw-raw@{storage_account}AppealAttributeMatrix/"
entries = mssparkutils.fs.ls(base_dir)
date_dirs = [e.name.strip("/").split("/")[-1]
             for e in entries
             if re.fullmatch(r"\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}", e.name.strip("/").split("/")[-1])]

if not date_dirs:
    raise FileNotFoundError(f"No YYYY-MM-DD folders found under {base_dir}")

ingestion_date = max(date_dirs)
print(f"Using latest ingestion_date: {ingestion_date}")

file_path = f"{base_dir}{ingestion_date}/appeals-attribute-matrix.csv"
target_path = f"abfss://odw-standardised@{storage_account}AppealAttributeMatrix/appeal_attribute_matrix"

df = (
    spark.read
    .option("header", True)
    .option("inferSchema", True)
    .option("ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace", True)
    .option("ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace", True)
    .csv(file_path)
)

valid_columns = [field.name for field in df.schema.fields if field.name and field.name.strip() != "" and not field.name.strip().startswith("_c")]
df = df.select(*valid_columns)

df = df.filter(~(col("attribute").isNull() | (col("attribute").rlike(r'^\s*["\']?\s*$'))))

def to_camel_case(colname: str) -> str:
    parts = re.split(r'\s+', colname.strip())
    return parts[0].lower() + ''.join(p.capitalize() for p in parts[1:])

for colname in df.columns:
    new_name = to_camel_case(colname)
    df = df.withColumnRenamed(colname, new_name)

df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").option("mergeSchema","true").save(target_path)
table_name = "odw_standardised_db.appeal_attribute_matrix"

if not spark.catalog.tableExists(table_name):
    print(f"Table '{table_name}' created.")
else:
    print(f"Table '{table_name}' already exists. If new schema changes have been added, the table has been updated.")

df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").option("mergeSchema","true").option("overwriteSchema","true").saveAsTable(table_name)

display(df)
